WAY OF THE HERO

Face adversity, manage your emotions & find inner peace

Learn the key principles of Cognitive Behavioural Therapy, Mindfulness, Breathwork, Acceptance & Commitment Therapy & Stoic Wisdom.

Trailer Explore

Weekly Awakepaper®

Learn the twelve secrets to facing adversity & managing your emotions.

  • Summary
  • Structure
  • FAQs

    • Facing Adversity is something we all have to deal with. Stress, life challenges, personal obstacles, broken hearts and lost loved ones. Like a Hero in a movie, we can use these challenges to help us grow and evolve, while also learning important lessons along the way.

    We've taken the best principles from Cognitive Behavioural therapy, Mindfulness, Breathwork and stoic wisdom and packaged them into one program.

    Benefits

    • Learn to face your fears and find inner peace
    • Experience more chill every day
    • Build emotional resilience and learn to handle stuff better
    • Deepen your self-awareness and emotional intelligence
    • Learn to control your emotions
    • Take emotional responsibility and avoid the reactive mindset
    • Achieve emotional mastery

    We've broken the series down into 12 stages, each class maps out key tools and principles for mastering adversity.

    Course Structure

    1. The hero’s journey. You are the hero of your own story.
    2. The secret of happiness. CBT, Mindfulness & Stoic history.
    3. Emotional Responsibility. Your thoughts create your experience.
    4. The cause of suffering. Rigid thoughts, rules & attachments.
    5. Contemplation. Question what you believe.
    6. Polarisation. Step out of extreme thinking habits.
    7. Face your fear. Breathwork & Mindfulness.
    8. Let go & let flow. The art of flexible thinking.
    9. Commitment. Clarify your values.
    10. Core fear. Discover the core beliefs that run your life.
    11. Life Audit. Free yourself of historical thought patterns.
    12. The Superior Way. Obstacles are opportunities.

    These are the contents of tab 3.
